alert.note: Alert for Lower Clark Fork Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 06 at 1:52PM MST until December 08 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM THURSDAY TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 4 to 7 inches at Lookout Pass, 2 to 4 inches Evaro Hill, and up to 2 inches at lower elevations. Between 4 to 8 am MST Thursday, snow rates could exceed 0.50" per hour at Lookout Pass. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph causing reduced visibility from blowing snow over Lookout Pass. * WHERE...Evaro Hill, I-90 Lookout Pass to Haugan, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains, and Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron. * WHEN...From 3 AM Thursday to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
